nnsec.net
Class NetWrapper

java.lang.Object
  nnsec.net.NetWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetIFace
public class NetWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetIFace

This kind of objects wraps around net instances, hiding real structure of the net.

Nested Class Summary
 
Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface nnsec.net.NetIFace
NetIFace.Link, NetIFace.Node
 
Constructor Summary
NetWrapper(NetIFace embedded)
          NetWrapper base constructor, it sets basket size by default to: net hidden layer size * 2 .
NetWrapper(NetIFace embedded, int size)
          NetWrapper extended constructor, it sets basket size to the proposed size only if proposed size is higher than net hidden layer size.

Constructor Detail

NetWrapper

public NetWrapper(NetIFace embedded)
NetWrapper base constructor, it sets basket size by default to: net hidden layer size * 2 .

Parameters:
embedded - net reference.

NetWrapper

public NetWrapper(NetIFace embedded,
                  int size)
NetWrapper extended constructor, it sets basket size to the proposed size only if proposed size is higher than net hidden layer size.

Parameters:
embedded - net reference.
size - proposed basket size.
Method Detail

setWrapSize

public void setWrapSize(int nsize)
This method permits to modify hidden layer size of the hidden referenced net with a new size.

Parameters:
nsize - number of fake nodes to be added.

public NetIFace getEmbedded()
This method permits to retrieve the embedded net.

scrambleGroups

public void scrambleGroups()
This method scrambles real nodes (the nodes that are member of net) if they belongs to the same group.
